alert.note: Alert for Cheyenne County; Kit Carson County; Yuma County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Wind Chill Advisory issued January 26 at 8:00PM MST until January 29 at 9:00AM MST by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 5 PM MST /6 PM CST/ SATURDAY TO 9 AM MST /10 AM CST/ SUNDAY... * WHAT...Very cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 15 below zero. * WHERE...Portions of east central and northeast Colorado, northwest and west central Kansas and southwest Nebraska. * WHEN...From 5 PM MST /6 PM CST/ Saturday to 9 AM MST /10 AM CST/ Sunday. * IMPACTS...Limit your time outdoors if possible as these cold wind chill readings will cause frostbite in a very short time.
info.instruction: Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves.

area.areaDesc: Cheyenne County; Kit Carson County; Yuma County
